short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon lets you to specify a bunch of urls to be open when you click the coffee cup in the morning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on lets you to specify in the options a bunch of web pages URLs separated by a line. When you are in your morning routine you can click the add-on icon and it will open your favorites web pages.
